Text:
Hey mods,
if you have a script to spot and delete spam in comments, movietube, movietubeb, FREESITE, and BTW
would be good words to add.
Usually spammers and links to virus/rootkit sites seem to be dealt with quick here, but these pests keep coming back.
They keep trying, but we nuke them all.  :)

hi
